Html:
Hello!
I am grateful for this project!
I am developing a software tool that allows the evacuation of population from the zone of destruction in the event of an emergency.
And I have a question how to identify evacuation routes from one point of landing in a few paragraphs evacuation?
For earlier many thanks!

i'm glad to hear that ;} ..but have no answers for emergency, sorry ;}

p.s. you can get route between two point using GMaps.Instance.GetRouteBetweenPoints
